meanings.definition: Not attractive or appealing in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The old, unprepossessing house stood alone on the hill.
meanings.sent2: The unprepossessing painting failed to catch anyone's eye at the art show.
meanings.sent3: Despite its unprepossessing exterior, the house was cozy and welcoming inside.
meanings.sent4: The unprepossessing rock turned out to be a valuable gemstone when cut open.
meanings.sent5: The unprepossessing flower bloomed into a stunning masterpiece of colors and shapes.

meanings.sent1: The unprepossessing salesman struggled to make any sales at the convention.
meanings.sent2: Her unprepossessing personality made it hard for her to make friends.
meanings.sent3: Despite his unprepossessing looks, he had a great sense of humor that won everyone over.
meanings.sent4: The unprepossessing book cover belied the captivating story within its pages.
meanings.sent5: Her unprepossessing voice transformed into a mesmerizing melody when she sang.
